1.content:
You are on Vacation in a small village. There is a Rumor amongst the Townsfolk that in a certain house, there lives a Woman who has inhuman powers. No one who ever visited this Women has come back so far.

You ask some People about where the house is and if they know any explanation what kind of powers the woman has. No one has any reasonable explanation but you now know where the house is.

Do you investigate on your own or do you stay out of that dangerous adventure?
1.title: The Mysterious House

11.content:
You decide to check out the house because you don´t believe that this Woman can simply make everybody who visits them disappear.

After a 30 minute walk away from the village you find the house the townsfolk told you about. Its a small house but relatively modern if you compare it to the village.There are no windows and one big Door in the middle in the house. You get a strange feeling because of the missing windows but still decide to check it out. You knock on the door, but you get no response. You knock again but still hear no answer. After knocking for a third time, you realize that the door isn´t even closed.
11.title: Check it out

choices: I wanted to see it for myself(unwilling)
I didnt hear anything about you(willing)
111.content: You sneak inside, trying to make no sound at all. After all you still don´t know if its a trap or not. You look around but you need some time so you can see in the dark room. The first room alone is gigantic but there is barely anything inside. You decide to go in further. After reaching the middle of the room, you hear the door close and someone locking the door. You spin around to see a Woman with red glowing hair. At first you only stare at her, wondering what will happen. Suddenly she starts speaking : "So there finally is another one. I never thought that i would see another human being after the townsfolk telling these stories about me. Tell me, why are you here? ".
111.title: Go inside

1111.content: "I see... so what exactly did you want to see? why all these people are missing?". You tell her that you didn´t believe that People would simply vanish after visiting a house."Ah yes it´s always someone that doesn´t believe the people in the village. I´ll tell you something : you should have listened to them. I can make people vanish but in a special way. Just close your eyes for one second and i´ll show you.

info.description:
You are on Vacation when you hear about a Woman living in a house nearby.What will happen?
Everything written here will be non-fatal.

This is my first Story so i would appreciate some feedback.

I will still give some rules here if you still want to add something :

NO scat
Try to use decent grammar and spelling. If i think that its not enjoyable to read i will edit/delete it
NO death. I cant stand death in stories like this
